page.title: 15OUR DAY AT ST OUEN'S BAY
page.content:
We are Emma (8 years) and Simon (6 years) and we live in St Helier.
Our Mummy and Daddy drove us to a Barbeque at the Barge Aground in St Ouen's Bay.
First we played with Tammy and our other friends from the Jersey Spina Bifida Association and then Simon and Tammy had sausages and beefburgers and Emma had chicken. We had Coke and Fanta to drink and after, Auntie Jo came around with some delicious ice cream.
When we had finished our food we all had a ride on Thimble who had come from the Riding for the Disabled Association.
We played in the sand until the end.
